company_info.Company Description: TFG VACATIONS INDIA is a travel & tourism company based in India!Besides offering travel & tourism services, worldwide, we offer online promotion work opportunities.TFG VACATIONS INDIA PVT.LTD, one of the fast growing company in Travel & Tourism industry is providing online income opportunity.We need committed & result-oriented people who can join hands with us & contribute in the promotion.Earn huge benefits in form of income (weekly/monthly).Come & work in a no target, no selling, no work pressure, no time Boundation & no boss environment.Nature of Business Promotion of Tourism services.Income You can earn up to Rs.45,000/- per month.Benefit No Time Bound, No Skill required.
